item.title: “Failure Is Not an Option”: An Oral History of ‘Apollo 13’
item.description: Thirty years after depicting space like no film before (or since), Ron Howard and his crew — including Tom Hanks, Brian Grazer, Ed Harris, Kevin Bacon, Gary Sinise, Kathleen Quinlan and Clint Howard —
